reviews.review: The game feels like a beta for Team Fortress 2. Despite that, still great to play. Though the community may be thining out slowly, you might wanna think twice before buying this (unless you're an avid Valve fan)

Oh man, oh man, This game. This game right here. I don't care what you punk ass bitches think, but this game right here. Oh man. 

It's just amazing.

another work of art from valve that is really a great class based WW2 game the teams are very balanced and so are the weapons and the maps are very well made and this game gets new maps from time to time so if your not bored of WW2 games or if you want a finally made shooter you should get this and for 10$ it cant hurt

Hackers and cheats play this game. In my short time playing this game and my long time playing Counter-Strike Source and 1.6 I have never seen as many cheaters as there are in Day Of Defeat Source. This one guy tried saying he was so good because he entered tournaments, one round of spectating and it was obvious he was wall-hacking with an aim-bot. While its not a bad game in any sense of the word, the players totally ruin it. Try playing Team Fortress 2 instead.

It's not your normal run and gun style, nor is it boring huge maps. Success is heavily based on team gameplay, classes (machine gunner, assault, medic, etc.), and good positioning. A great change of pace from Call of Duty and Battlefield. Now, I just wished more people would play this game.
Good all around game play.  Well worth the investment.  :)

é um cs à moda antiga!

Esse é um daqueles jogos que não se encaixa em um gênero específico. Algumas partes se encaixam no gênero FPS arcade enquanto outras se encaixam mais no FPS hardore. 

Antes de ter contato com jogos mais realistas tipo ARMA ou Red Orchestra, DOD e DOD:S eram o mais próximo de realismo que eu já havia visto em um shooter multijogador.

É um jogo definitivamente divertido e que possui uma mecânica interessante pois os tiros são bem fatais (é comum derrubar inimigos com 1-3 tiros) o que destaca o título dos demais games online onde vc tem que gastar toneladas de munição para derrubar os oponentes.

Conta também com 3 modos de jogo (captura de território, gun game, explodir objetivos) o que ajuda na variedade de gameplay.

Está longe de ser um título tático mas mesmo após ter jogado outros com mecânica superior ainda continuo voltando para DOD:S pois este oferece uma jogabilidade mais relaxada e consigo me distrair mais com ele.

Enfim, um ótimo passatempo para desestressar.

Pra quem gosta de um bom e velho FPS à moda antiga esse jogo não pode faltar em sua lista.

I recently bought this game on sale for 2$ and now I'm kicking myself for not having paid full price for it two years ago.
Twitchy trigger action like in C.S.S but employing a different strategy with the older weapons and tighter maps, and class limits for teams.
Community is smaller than C.S.S but still lots of servers rocking full 24/7.

I really enjoy this game and would recommend it over C.S.S anyday.
Não recomendo esse jogo, as armas tem coices forçados, a sniper demora 1/2 hora só para aproximar dos olhos, resumindo, nem perca o seu tempo

This game truly maximizes the Source engine. Going to World War II Valve shows how adaptive and flexible of any time of gameplay the Source engine can bring. This particular series of maps takes place in Europe and is the Eastern Front. The weapons are all authentic, the heavy MG's need to be mounted in order to wreak havoc properly. Fast-paced with a dash of realism. The maps are perfectly crafted for this type of gameplay. Many routes  to flank and pinch enemy forces. Underground sewers to give the sense of the crude ways used just to push the frontline ten feet forward. This game is one of the most exciting and balanced WWII shooters I have ever played.

I got this for £1.50 and I can't really say anything bad about the game. It's a fun 'pick up & play' kinda game. If you're looking for an in depth campaign with high drama then you're looking in the wrong place. This game doesn't claim to have a storyline. It's simply an online multiplayer game which is a hell of a lot of fun and it does its job brilliantly.

Play as the Axis Powers in this alternate telling of the Battle of the Bulge.  Crush the American and British forces with your arsenal of TIger Tanks, Half-Tracks, Panzerschrek brigades, and Stukkas!  A fantastic single player experience and a ground-breaker in the Real Time Strategy genre.  HIghly recommended.

THE BEST ONLINE 1st PERSON SHOOTER EVER....
WW2

A WW2-themed tactical FPS that's host to a strange mix of both arcade and oddly realistic elements, Day of Defeat has always been one of the more interesting oddities in Valve's catalog. Balancing these more arcade mechanics - frantic movement speeds, excellent accuracy while not using sights, and near-perfect accuracy while ADS - with more "realistic" mechanics like scope sway, players dropping their weapons when they get shot in the arm, and suppressing fire that effects players' aim was undoubtedly a tough task for the DoD team... and somehow, they pulled it off. 

Both DoD games are well worth a purchase for anyone interested in seeing early "arcade realism" FPS design experimentation. I'd recommend the original to anyone who'd like to see the game's mechanics distilled to their utter basics, and Source to anyone who's interested in seeing what the technological achievements of Source brought to the table. Note: the first game had factions, weapons, and maps that aren't present in its Source version at all. Which is yet another reason I'd honestly recommend purchasing both games, if you can. Also, [i]please[/i] pick up Day of Infamy, 'cause that game's a pretty perfect unofficial third entry in the series.

I do not like alot of WWII shooters but if your a fan of this one, try this. Take is as an approach with a mix of the orignal call of duty and Semi Team Fortress/counterstrike gameplay. Quien no ha soñado con un videojuego de la 2º guerra mundial al puro estilo valve
pues aqui esta el Day Of Defeat: Source alemanes contra americanos la epica batalla en un perfecto ambiente grafico. El juego consta de dos bandos que disputan puntos de control o deven destruir objetivos de el equipo contrario.
Para ello un elaborado arsenal de armas perfectamente recreadas te vastara.
De su anterior entrega se a traido algunos sonidos y su frenetica guerra rapida.
aunque podria aver traido tambien el bando Ingles. Pero creeme no lo echaras en falta. la cooperatividad y la coordinacion de el equipo tambien puede ser un gran factor que le añade esa majia valve a esta entrega i sino simplemente juega, echate una risas con tus amigos y pasa una tarde a los mas estilo Day of Defeat

« Day of Defeat: Source » — продолжение « Day of Defeat », лучше ли она своего оригинала? — Нет. Играбельна? — Да.
Единственным, пожалуй, плюсом по сравнению с первою частью является движок « Source » и обновлённая графика с картами, в остальном одни минусы:
[list]
    [*]Вырезано [b]ВЕЛИКОЕ[/b] множество оружия и клаccов вместе с ним;
    [*]Вырезана фракция: Соединённое Королевство.
[/list]
